text.emotional: You should have a fertilizer spreader, fertilizer, and lime, so you can increase the yield. Keep in mind, not every spreader might be able to apply lime.
text.silence: {.} you should have {.} a fertilizer spreader {....} fertilizer {....} and lime {....} so you can increase the yield {...} keep in mind {...} not {...} every spreader {..} might be able to apply lime {...}
